patterns: Why didn’t I receive the verification code on my mobile phone?
I didn’t get my verification code.
I am not receiving the verification code.
responses:
There are multiple reasons preventing the code from being received on your mobile phone, here are some possibilities:
• The text message inbox is full.
• The phone is set to block messages from unknown senders.
• The phone carrier is blocking the message.

patterns: I’m stuck on the Docusign step, I can’t sign the documents.
I cannot sign the Docusign documents.
Docusign is not working for me.
responses: If the Docusign exceeds 120 days, it will be automatically voided. Please contact technical support to fix it.

patterns: What are the password requirements?
Can you tell me the password rules?
What should my password include?
responses:
Minimum 8 characters long.
 Maximum 25 characters long.
 It cannot be the same as your username.
 It cannot be an email address.
 Cannot start with a dot or a new line.
 It cannot have more than 3 numbers in a row.
 Cannot be the same as your prior 3 passwords.
 Must include at least one of each of the following character types:
 Uppercase letter.
 Lowercase letter.
 Number.
 Special character.

patterns: I need to update my information after signing the Docusign?
How can I update my information?
Can I change my info after Docusign?
responses: Please contact the client service at: clientservices@cgdirect.ca.

patterns: I’m blocked, I can’t login.
My account is locked.
I cannot log in to my account.
responses: Usually, if you try multiple times with the wrong password, you will be automatically locked. Please contact client service to unlock your account.

patterns: I can’t download all documents; the button is disabled.
Download button is not available.
Why can’t I download documents?
responses: You need to sign the client documents sent to you by email.

patterns: The submit for authorization button disappeared.
Where is the authorization button?
I can’t find the submit button for authorization.
responses: The client is active; you don’t need to submit the client for authorization.

patterns: I can’t sign the client documents.
How do I sign the client documents?
I am unable to sign the documents.
responses: The Docusign has been voided. Please contact the CG support team for help.
